posts.post_content:
Definitely the strongest shrine, at least in Limited. (Verdict on Constructed is still out, since it's not in the pool yet, we'll see.)  
  
Like all the shrines, he can sit in the corner and be easily forgotten about. Even if he's not, your opponent had better either have artifact hate or a wrath effect. I was blown out on turn 8 with one of these guys popping for 10 little Myr at the end of my turn. Being able to suddenly get a swarm is a good thing.  
  
Imagine this plus [Tempered Steel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tempered Steel).

posts.post_content: Cards like this have great flexibility. If it is destroyed when you don't have the mana to activate it, you are only out a card and ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol). It has a rattlesnake effect on your opponents. It discourages opponent wrath, and makes your own more powerful.
